data.actual_result: You aren't able to scroll down, making the ban button super hard to press because it's cutoff by the screen.
data.expected_result: You should be able to scroll down, and easily press the ban button.
data.short_description: Ban button is cutoff and you can't scroll down when banning users. [4 inch only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the server name - Go to server settings - Go to members - Select a member that you want to ban
